title: The People That Melt in the Rain
description: The moment that 12 year old Laura arrives in her new home town of Deluge, a rain of green frogs falls from the sky. In the days that follow, she discovers a forest of tiny creatures in her neighbor's cupboard and a terrible curse upon the whole town.On Laura's first day of school, she discovers a Rain God trapped inside a painpainting in the school library. The Rain God, Huya, brought misery and pain to the town of Deluge many years ago... She calls to Laura to free her... Will she unleash this menace on her new hometown? Can she free herself and the people of Deluge from this mysterious curse?
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
